attributes.review:
I am a complete and total Trump supporter I hate those dumb snowflake millennials ruining our world by believing human life is more important than the capitalist system of whom’s boots I love to lick.

This app is not at all user friendly to anyone with a lick of sense. I joined this app and within moments I became a dumbass who can’t spell or read and believes whatever this crusty old Cheeto I found on my floor says to me please help? Anyways I’ll be heading out to a very crowded indoor area with no mask in hopes of killing someone’s loved one, good day y’all!

Also why is this app #1 in the news category? It’s not a news app it’s a political app I’m speechless y’all aren’t even trying to cover your tracks anymore.
attributes.title: Completely Unusable

attributes.review: This app is total garbage... you would think that being the president of the US and kept america great 🥴 that his app would at least work! But sadly this is not the case! I got notifications 40-50 times a day, so many that all my other important notifications were lost in a sea of fascist alerts! -100000000000/10 DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!

attributes.review: At first when i installed this app it was made to help me support my President. after about a week of having it i saw a lot of disgusting racist and pedophilia comments made by our cheeto president. The next day i couldn’t find my chickens and their eggs. I was mad that i couldn’t have scrabbled eggs for breakfast i soon remembered that the app was glitching. I now officially blame trump for the loss of my beloved chickens. DUMP TRUMP 2020
attributes.title: DUMP TRUMP🧚🏿‍♀️🧚🏽‍♀️

attributes.review: This app will make u vomit every time u open it and I have no idea why. It makes worms fall out of your a** TOO🤢🤢 it literally bugs out and steals your mail AND toe nails. Like how am I supposed to make earrings now😡. This app is gross I’ve been vomiting, mails missing, my TOENAILS missing, AND ive been pooping WORMS because of this app how disgusting. DO NOT RECOMMEND AT ALL!!
attributes.title: NASTY

attributes.review:
Once upon a time there was a lovely 
                         princess. But she had an enchantment 
                         upon her of a fearful sort which could 
                         only be broken by love's first kiss. 
                         She was locked away in a castle guarded 
                         by a terrible fire-breathing dragon. 
                         Many brave knights had attempted to 
                         free her from this dreadful prison, 
                         but non prevailed. She waited in the 
                         dragon's keep in the highest room of 
                         the tallest tower for her true love 
                         and true love's first kiss. (laughs) 
                         Like that's ever gonna happen. What 
                         a load of - (toilet flush)
 
               Allstar - by Smashmouth begins to play. Shrek goes about his 
               day. While in a nearby town, the villagers get together to go 
               after the ogre.
 
               NIGHT - NEAR SHREK'S HOME

                                     MAN1
                         Think it's in there?

                                     MAN2
                         All right. Let's get it!

                                     MAN1
                         Whoa. Hold on. Do you know what that 
                         thing can do to you?
 
                                     MAN3
                         Yeah, it'll grind your bones for it's 
                         bread.
 
               Shrek sneaks up behind them and laughs.

                                     SHREK
                         Yes, well, actually, that would be a 
                         giant. Now, ogres, oh they're much worse. 
                         They'll make a suit from your freshly 
                         peeled skin.
 
                                     MEN
                         No!

                                     SHREK
                         They'll shave your liver. Squeeze the 
                         jelly from your eyes! Actually, it's 
                         quite good on toast.
 
                                     MAN1
                         Back! Back, beast! Back! I warn ya! 
                         (waves the torch at Shrek.)
 
               Shrek calmly licks his fingers and extinguishes the torch. The 
               men shrink back away from him. Shrek roars very loudly and long 
               and his breath extinguishes all the remaining torches until the 
               men are in the dark.
 
                                     SHREK
                         This is the part where you run away. 
                         (The men scramble to get away. He laughs.) 
                         And stay out! (looks down and picks 
                         up a piece of paper. Reads.) "Wanted. 
                         Fairy tale creatures."(He sighs and 
                         throws the paper over his shoulder.)
 
                         
               THE NEXT DAY

               There is a line of fairy tale creatures. The head of the guard 
               sits at a table paying people for bringing the fairy tale creatures 
               to him. There are cages all around. Some of the people in line 
               are Peter Pan, who is carrying Tinkerbell in a cage, Gipetto 
               who's carrying Pinocchio, and a farmer who is carrying the three 
               little pigs.
 
                                     GUARD
                         All right. This one's full. Take it 
                         away! Move it along. Come on! Get up!
 
                         
                                     HEAD GUARD
                         Next!

                                     GUARD
                         (taking the witch's broom) Give me that! 
                         Your flying days are over. (breaks the 
                         broom in half)
 
                                     HEAD GUARD
                         That's 20 pieces of silver for the witch. 
                         Next!
 
                                     GUARD
                         Get up! Come on!

                                     HEAD GUARD
                         Twenty pieces.

                                     LITTLE BEAR
                         (crying) This cage is too small.

                                     DONKEY
                         Please, don't turn me in. I'll never 
                         be stubborn again. I can change. Please! 
                         Give me another chance!
 
                                     OLD WOMAN
                         Oh, shut up. (jerks his rope)

                                     DONKEY
                         Oh!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
